value:
$WmMPID_ティニー,ch06_32_Tiny_F_Normal,Face|This pendant? It's a memento.
I carry it always.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face_Pain|...Ughh...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|There you are, my little Veronica...
How have you been?$k$pYou must be hungry... Poor thing.
I heard you've not eaten for days.
Not even a drop of water!$k$pBut of course you haven't been
given anything... When I give an
order, I am obeyed.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Your execution will take place on the
day after tomorrow. It's nearly here!
The anticipation must be unbearable.$k$p...$k$pCare to share what's on your mind?
You look like you have something you
want to say... Do go on.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|Sissy...$k$p...Wh-what do you want from me?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|What? Is it not clear yet?$k$pEverything! I want to take everything
from you. Your wealth, your power,
your life...everything you have.$k$pAnd after your execution, I'll take
your mother's seat on the imperial
throne as well.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|And what then?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...Pardon?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|You become emperor...and then...
What will you do as emperor?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|I used to never consider the impact
people have on the Empire, but
someone changed my mind.$k$pThey said a ruler's purpose is the
service of their people—that I was
selfish for behaving otherwise...$k$pI have spent more time with Prince
Alfonse and Princess Sharena than
I may care to admit...$k$pI believe they always have the needs
of their people at heart...$k$pI want to be more like that.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|...Sissy? What do you think?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Spare me! Even now, pitiful as you
are, you still dare to condescend to
me—as if you're my better?!$k$pGuards! This prisoner requires
a lashing!$k$pDo not stop until you've wiped all
defiance from her face... NOW!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|Do what you want with me...$k$pJust treat...my people...well...$k$p$Sbs150|
